about_the_game:
Heya fellow burrows enjoyer!

Happy about your bunny-catching?
Can't get that one annoying bun?
Still unsure how to make babies?
Ophéline is being mean to you???

Getting this content absolutely won't help with any of this, but it will definitely support us!

This Supporter Pack contains:

  • Playable Ophéline?? (omg) (actually it's Pâquerette disguised as Ophéline but shh)
  • Exclusive in-game dialogues (Ophéline is a bit mad about the disguise)

Disclaimer:

Please keep in mind this Pack is, first and foremost, a way to support us three from Bunstack <3

Access:

Disguise is available in the Shop after capturing 20 bunnies.
Exclusive dialogues are unlocked throughout the main progression, wearing the disguise around Ophéline is required for the dialogues to appear.
